konsistent-kode.description: Generer kode som følger prosjektets konvensjoner

patterns.ny-pattern: create a new pattern following the existing pattern generator structure in tools/create-pattern.js for {PATTERN_NAME} in category {CATEGORY}
patterns.nytt-tool: create a new tool following the TypeScript/Bun structure used in DECISION_MANAGEMENT/decision-tracker.ts for {TOOL_PURPOSE}

dybde-analyse.description: Analyser kodebasen for mønstre og forbedringer

commands.prosjektstruktur: analyze the current project structure and identify inconsistencies or deviations from the established patterns in tools/ and capability directories
commands.missing-patterns: examine all TypeScript files and JavaScript tools to identify recurring code patterns that should be documented in docs/patterns/
commands.dependency-analysis: analyze import statements across all TypeScript and JavaScript files to map dependencies and suggest architectural improvements
commands.kompleksitet: analyze code complexity in DECISION_MANAGEMENT/ and AI_INTEGRATION/ directories and suggest simplifications based on existing simple patterns

commands.generer-docs: generate comprehensive README.md files for each capability directory based on the TypeScript interfaces and classes found in them
commands.oppdater-docs: update docs/integration-guide.md based on current AI_INTEGRATION/ implementation and ensure it matches the actual code structure
commands.test-anbefalinger: suggest test strategies for the tools in tools/ directory based on the existing pattern generator and decision tracker implementations
commands.api-docs: document all exported interfaces and classes from DECISION_MANAGEMENT/decision-tracker.ts in a structured API format

commands.konsistenssjekk: check consistency across all capability directories and ensure they follow the same organizational patterns established in the project
commands.performance: analyze performance bottlenecks in decision-tracker.ts and pattern-analytics-engine.js and suggest optimizations while maintaining the existing API
commands.refactoring: suggest refactoring opportunities in tools/ to reduce code duplication while maintaining the existing CLI interfaces
commands.validering: validate that the current capability directory structure aligns with the ADRs in docs/adr/ and suggest improvements

ai-intelligence.description: Unified AI Intelligence operations with Krin + Chronicle Keeper

commands.adr-index: update docs/adr/index.md to include all ADRs found in docs/adr/ directory following the established format
commands.pattern-index: ensure docs/patterns/ has proper index files for each category (architecture, typescript, python, java) based on existing files
commands.capability-overview: generate overview documentation for each capability directory showing how the TypeScript tools and markdown docs work together
commands.ai-integration-check: verify that AI_INTEGRATION/ tools properly read and parse ADR files according to the interfaces defined in decision-tracker.ts

conventions.templates: Markdown-basert med emojis og structured content
conventions.emoji-usage: Konsistent bruk av emojis i dokumentasjon og logging
